text: Agar tu ej Pajomʙar, az imon naovardani kuffor ʙa'di didani hamai in ojotho dar taaccuʙ meoi, pas taaccuʙ dar suxani onhost, ki megujand: ojo on hangom ki xok savem, az nav moro ʙijofarinad? Inho ʙa Parvardigorason imon nadorand va dar ruzi qijomat ʙar gardanhojason zancirho ʙosad va ahli cahannamand va dar on covidonand
